title: [Neuroscience] Even mild COVID-19 can cause your brain to shrink

[Epidemiology] More than 3 times as many people may have died around the world due to direct and indirect effects of the COVID-19 pandemic than officially reported. The countries with the most excess deaths were India, with 4.07 million deaths; the US, with 1.13 million deaths; and Russia, with 1.07 million deaths
